autosave.hint: Saves the game automatically on a regular basis. Does not overwrite manual saves even if enabled.

clearBattleDataOnExit.hint: Reduces save data size by clearing stale battle data after a battle is completed. WARNING: disabled by default currently, as it can cause game-breaking bugs.

maxSkillsInCategory.hint: Number of skills the player is able to hold in each category at once. Numbers smaller than 4 are not recommended.

turnDelayMs.hint: Milliseconds to delay when performing an enemy battle turn.
